title: Customer Service Practical Competency Enhancement: Blended Learning Approach Design for Web-Based Remote Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and Practical Experience in the Relevant Field
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners must set object-oriented learning goals on web-based platforms and independently construct three or more learning objects.
Learners must successfully complete real-world social problem-solving scenarios in simulation/VR environments with at least 80% accuracy.
Through a blended learning approach (40% self-study, 30% real-time online sessions, 30% face-to-face workshops), learners must establish strategies for analyzing and solving complex social issues.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
